William Macy

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Unknown
  3. Location of Family: Republican City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Alma, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: In a letter written from Republican City, NE, in 1884 to the Children's Aid Society, William states he is living on a farm and is very content.
  10. Source: Thirty-Second Annual Report of the Children's Aid Society, November 1884 (New York: Wynkoop and Hallenbeck, 1884), 78-79
